mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , A.COUNT as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.USER_NAME as writerNm FROM TB_BOARD A INNER JOIN TB_USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_ID WHERE IDX=#{idx}
